price: Na ni Ishara kwao kwamba Sisi tuliwapakia dhuriya zao katika jahazi ilio sheheni.
arabic: وَءَايَةٞ لَّهُمۡ أَنَّا حَمَلۡنَا ذُرِّيَّتَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡفُلۡكِ ٱلۡمَشۡحُونِ
footnotes: Na Ishara nyengine kwao ni kuwa Sisi tuliwapakia wanaadamu katika jahazi ilio jaa bidhaa zao na riziki zao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: waāyatun lahum annā ḥamalnā dhurriyyatahum fī al-ful'ki al-mashḥūni
